title: Rwanda Industrial Production
description: Industrial Production in Rwanda increased 6.40 percent in September of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Industrial Production in Rwanda averaged 10.04 percent from 2007 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 90 percent in April of 2021 and a record low of -40.70 percent in April of 2020. In Rwanda, industrial production measures the output of businesses integrated in industrial sector of the economy such as manufacturing, mining, and utilities. This page provides - Rwanda Industrial Production - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: National Institute of Statistics of Rwanda
